text: Perfect World Game Personal Information Protection Policy
Perfect World Group (hereinafter referred to as "Perfect World" or "We") respects and protects the personal information of the perfect world application.

We will be handled in accordance with the "Perfect World Game Personal Information Protection Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") (including activities including collecting, storage, use, processing, transmission, provision, and openness) (hereinafter referred to as "you")Personal information in world applications.

"Perfect World Group" refers to Perfect World (Beijing) Software Technology Development Co., Ltd. (Registration address: 7th floor 701-14, Building, No. 5, No. 1, No. 1, Shangdi East Road, Haidian District, Beijing, contact address: Wang Jingdong, Chaoyang District, BeijingLuo No. 1 Perfect World Building A) and its subordinates and its affiliated branches and their affiliated companies or joint ventures.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: Registered address: Room 701-14, Floor 7, Building 5, Yard 1, Shangdi East Road, Haidian District, Beijing, Contact Address: Block A, Perfect World Building, No. 1 Wangjing East Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing

text: For the definition of "affiliated companies", please refer to the definition of keywords.

"Perfect World Application" refers to the Perfect World Group's supporting Perfect Permit Account, Perfect World Mobile Game Account (formerly Tiger account) or other third -party account registration, login, login, computer client game, mobile terminal game, and other forms of other formsGames ("Perfect World Games") and related websites (including but not limited to Wanmei.com, Laohu.com and its subsequent websites and other websites that may be opened), as well asOther terminal applications, the aforementioned websites and terminals can be called or "perfect world applications."
In accordance with relevant laws and regulations, we formulate this policy and committed to protecting your personal information security.

This policy contains our clauses to handle and protect your personal information. We recommend that you read this policy completely. When needed, you make a proper choice in accordance with the guidance of this policy.
label: Policy Change

text: In order to make you fully understand the content of this policy, the terms of the existence of or may have a significant relationship with your rights in this policy, we have adopted a rough body to indicate that you pay attention.
label: Policy Change

text: If you do not agree with any content of this policy, we will not be able to provide you with services for perfect world applications (hereinafter referred to as "service"), you should immediately stop using our services.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you do not agree with any content of this policy, we will not be able to provide you.

text: When you agree with this policy, you have agreed that we have agreed to process your relevant information in accordance with this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When you agree with this policy, you have agreed that we have agreed to process your relevant information in accordance with this policy.

1. How do we collect and use your personal information

According to the principles of legal, correctness, necessary, and integrity, we only collect the information necessary for the realization of product/service functions to achieve clear and reasonable processing purposes.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: When we provide the following functions and services, we may process the following information related to you.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you do not provide relevant information, you may not be able to register as our user or enjoy some of the products/services we provide, or you may not be able to achieve the intended effect of using related services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide relevant information, you may not be able to register or use certain products/services or to achieve the expected results.

text: 1.1 User registration/login and real -name authentication function
You first need to register a perfect world game account (perfect pass account or perfect world mobile game account, excluding third -party accounts) to become a user of Perfect World Games.
When you register, you need to provide us with your own mobile phone number or email address. We will verify your identity by sending a SMS verification code or mail.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you register, collect your mobile phone number or email address for authentication

text: In order to meet the requirements of laws and regulations and regulators (such as the requirements for real -name authentication for game users), we also need to collect your name and ID number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your name and ID number to meet the requirements of real -name authentication

text: You can also use our products/services (app stores or channels, WeChat, etc., but excluding real-name authentication information) by logging in to the relevant account of the third-party platform that we cooperate with. We will obtain your authorization from such third-party Account name, nickname, open, ID and other information under the account item.

First Party Collection Information

text: Regarding the information we provided in the third direction, please carefully read the special prompts of the relevant login interface when logging in, or check the SDK with the login function through the "third -party SDK collection information list".

text: 1.3 Online shopping function
When you are going to settle the products/services in your online shopping cart in our online mall, our website system will generate orders you buy the product/service.

You need to fill in at least your consignee name, receiving address, mobile phone number and email address in the order (e -mail is selected to send electronic invoices to you). At the same timeThe product/service information you purchase, the amount and payment method you pay for.

text: 2. How do we use cookie and related technologies
When you use our product/service, we will store small data files named Cookie on your computer or mobile device.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.
We use these information to determine whether the registered users have logged in to improve service/product quality and optimize user experience.
